definitions.definition: An adjustable gate or valve used to control the flow of water through a sluice .
Anything that controls or limits an outpouring of people, emotion, etc.
A stream that passes through a floodgate; a torrent .

main_definition: An adjustable gate or valve used to control the flow of water through a sluice .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , extension ) Anything that controls or limits an outpouring of people, emotion, etc.
( obsolete ) A stream that passes through a floodgate; a torrent .
